scripts.test-rc-test: echo "\033[0;32mBasic RC File Usage\033[0m" && ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -e test node index.js
scripts.test-rc-test-prod: echo "\033[0;32mMultiple Environments RC File Usage\033[0m" && ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -e test,prod -r ./.cmdrc.json node index.js
scripts.test: npm run test-rc-test && npm run test-rc-test-prod
